product.title: The Prince and the Pauper | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
The Prince and the Pauper

Based on the 1930s Mark Twain story, this delightful Disney reprise narrates the story of the prince who swapped positions with a pauper. Both roles are played by the beloved Mickey Mouse with cameos by Donald Duck and Goofy, forming a fun-loving cast of characters that draws young readers into this classic story. The book’s underlying message encourages kids to always consider situations from multiple viewpoints, and to recognize that good character transcends riches and status.

Tie-in Activity: Switch roles with your child for an hour to give him a glimpse into your tasks and responsibilities. Have him prepare dinner while you play a game or read a book, or let him fold laundry while you do “homework.”
